tns:patch.author: Dolghier Constantin
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_pledges_tertiary_programs CASCADE; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_pledges_tertiary_programs AS SELECT afpp.pledge_id, COALESCE(level.name, '#') AS name, apl.id1 AS amp_program_id, sum(afpp.program_percentage) AS percentage, COUNT(*) - COUNT(afpp.program_percentage) AS cnt_nulls FROM amp_funding_pledges_program afpp JOIN ni_all_programs_with_levels apl ON afpp.amp_program_id = apl.amp_theme_id JOIN all_programs_with_levels oapl ON afpp.amp_program_id = oapl.amp_theme_id LEFT JOIN amp_theme level ON level.amp_theme_id = apl.id1 WHERE oapl.program_setting_name = 'Tertiary Program' GROUP BY afpp.pledge_id, apl.id1, level.amp_theme_id;
